articles.title: European Space Agency Releases New Mosaic Of Mars To Mark 20 Years Of Orbiter Launch - NDTV
articles.description: The mosaic provides fascinating information about Mars's composition, revealing an unprecedented variety and detail of colours across its surface.
articles.content:
The mosaic was created using data from Mars Expresss High-Resolution Stereo Camera
The European Space Agency has released a new mosaic of Mars to mark 20 years of the launch of its Mars Express. The… [+1962 chars]

articles.author: Marcia Dunn
articles.title: First-of-its-kind Mars livestream by ESA spacecraft interrupted at times by rain on Earth - Phys.org
articles.description: A European spacecraft around Mars sent its first livestream from the red planet to Earth on Friday to mark the 20th anniversary of its launch, but rain in Spain interfered at times.
articles.content:
A European spacecraft around Mars sent its first livestream from the red planet to Earth on Friday to mark the 20th anniversary of its launch, but rain in Spain interfered at times.
